column2: "Awwww... they look happy. Looks like there's something they want to show you this way."
"\"Behind\"... \"protect\"... \"robot\"... I see, so this is some kind of guardian robot."
"If we don't press forward, it probably won't attack us. But I guess we don't have any other options."
"<%me> can handle it. And I'm not so bad myself, believe it or not."
"It's going to get dangerous, so go hide somewhere. Don't come out until I say the coast is clear!"
